item.description:
ZoomInfo in Waltham Invites You to a Marketing Open House & Contest on November 2nd from 5-7pm! 

 

Would you like to showcase your work to win an iPad, $1k or $2K and possibly find your next dream marketing job? If so, we want to meet you! If you have at least 2 years of experience, are VERY tech savvy and want to take the next step in your career please Join Us. Check out the link for more info or call 781.693.7577.  http://www.zoominfo.com/business/about/careers.html

Please join us for a ZoomInfo sponsored event that recently gave a nice donation to support the Boston SEO Meetup group.

TO RSVP:

You can mention your going on the Meetup page. But be sure to contact HR to officially RSVP

Submit entries and RSVP with your resume to Jennie Cohen, HR Manager, at jennie.cohen@zoominfo.comThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it , or call 781.693.7577. The Open House will be held at ZoomInfo's headquarters, located at 307 Waverly Oaks Road in Waltham, MA (4th floor). Click here for directions.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: ZoomInfo Marketing OpenHouse. Enter to win an iPad, $1k or 2k
